actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
name: Ernest W. Dubester
nominee: Ernest W. Dubester, of Virginia, to be a Member of the Federal Labor Relations Authority for a term of five years expiring July 29, 2017. (Reappointment)
position: Member of the Federal Labor Relations Authority
referred to: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
